title: Socializing and Leisure
description: Improve your Japanese speaking skills with phrases typically used for socializing and leisure activities. Focus on clear pronunciation and friendly intonation.
instructions: Below is a list of phrases you might use for socializing and leisure activities in Japanese.
Aim for clear and engaging pronunciation.
